headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) Dividend Hike and Record Futures Trading Volumes
summary: On October 30, 2025, Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. announced a 7% increase in its quarterly dividend to US$0.48 per share for Q4 2025 and reported record futures trading volumes, rising open interest, and mixed third-quarter results with higher adjusted earnings and continued buybacks. The combination of strong trading activity, ongoing returns to shareholders, and growth in key business lines demonstrates the company's ability to generate cash and adapt amid shifting market...
